reviewText: Ginie shows you how to position your body to make you attractive to the opposite sex, and to everyone.  She demonstrates ways to walk, stand and sit that make you approachable to others.  She also gives you ways to position yourself in social situations that make people want to include you in their conversations.  There are great flirting techniques in this video!

This is a copy from an old video production of about 1992, sold on a
DVD-R.
The image quality and the information value are low. I would give zero points.
